author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police on Monday arrested seven persons, including four women, and seized 80 kg ganja from them. The police said that the group approached an autorickshaw driver in the New Bus Stand and wanted to go to Karumandurai. Since they spoke in Telugu, the driver got suspicious who alerted the traffic police who in turn informed the Pallapatti police on the bus stand premises. The police searched their bags and found the banned substance. Inquiries revealed that T. Selvi (35) of Karumandurai led the gang and brought the substance from Visakhapatnam to Salem. They had planned to handover the substance to a broker in Karumandurai.

They others were identified as K. Kameswara, N. Simmasala, C. Sandi, K. Kondamma, P. Lakshmi and K. Appalamma, all native of Visakhapatnam. They were produced in the court and lodged at prisons.
title: 80 kg ganja seized, seven held
